name: Keep It Hot
description:
Hello!

This is my first game, and a submission to the :

Level Up Circle: Beginner Jam #1

It is a short rythm game where you play the role of a blacksmith, and earn money making swords. Hit the blade at the right time, forge uniformelly and most importantly...

Keep It Hot! Credits:

Forge Background Picture: upklyak

https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/blacksmith-workshop-forge-with-anvil-hammer-...

Bellows Sound: Zapsplat

https://www.zapsplat.com/music/short-burst-of-fire-flames-burning-in-wind-versio...

Blades Pictures: insanity100

https://www.vecteezy.com/vector-art/124439-medieval-weapons

Anvil Sample Sound: Benboncan

https://freesound.org/people/Benboncan/sounds/103628/

Fire Ambient Sound: PhreaKsAccount

https://freesound.org/people/PhreaKsAccount/sounds/46272/
